channel.title: Posts on ACM/IFIP/USENIX MIDDLEWARE
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on ACM/IFIP/USENIX MIDDLEWARE

item.title: Policy Against Discrimination and Harassment
item.description: MIDDLEWARE is an ACM event and every edition of MIDDLEWARE strictly abides by the ACM Policy Against Discrimination and Harassment Any individual who experiences or witnesses harassment (as described above) at MIDDLEWARE or any ACM activity should follow the ACM Procedures for Reporting Unacceptable Behavior.

item.title: Want to Host MIDDLEWARE 2023/24?
item.description: For 2023 and 2024, the steering committee is primarily looking for bids locations outside North America. More details on submitting an expression of interest are available here
